quest.name: Travelers of Norvrandt
journal: The Crystal Exarch is finally ready to discuss the matter of your comrades' whereabouts.
objectives: Speak with the manager of suites in the Pendants.
Speak with the Crystal Exarch in the Ocular.

dialogue.name: GARLONDMAN03279
dialogue.text: I've been keeping that device you uncovered safe and sound. Did you need to use it again...?

dialogue.name: Q0
dialogue.text: Touch the beacon and travel to the First?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: You've done as I requested, and learned something of the world in which you find yourself. Now it's time I fulfilled my half of the bargain, and explained what has befallen your comrades.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: That is a conversation I would rather have in the privacy of my quarters, however. I must go on ahead to the tower and organize a few things, but I shall see that the guard knows to admit you.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: The tower's gate lies open, then?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Just like that? Then...G'raha Tia is...?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Well, yes, of course. It can be opened and closed just like any other. Does that seem strange to you?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: I know not how the tower functioned in your time, but I assure you there is no danger of us being locked inside.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: ...I am not familiar with that name. Is there something I should know?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: An extraordinary tale. But I'm afraid I found no such individual residing in the tower when it passed into my care. Mayhap we can revisit that mystery another time. For now, I think it best that we focus on the present.

dialogue.name: CRYSTALGATEKEEPER
dialogue.text: Greetings, madamsir. The Exarch awaits you within.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Enter the Crystal Tower?

dialogue.name: CRYSTALGATEKEEPER
dialogue.text: Touring the city with the Exarch, are you? You could have no finer guide!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: The Crystarium boasts a number of residential districts, but I have been informed that a room has just become available at the Pendants.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Which, as it turns out, is perfect. Our path there will take us past the markets, and I was hoping to give you my own introduction to their wares. Come along.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: As a result of your pact with Feo Ul, you now have access to delivery moogles, market boards, and summoning bells while in the First.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Pendants, misssir. You're here with the Exarch...?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: Ah, there you areâ”€I was just finalizing the matter of your accommodation. You'll have a private room here at the Pendants for the duration of your stay, to make use of as you see fit.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: When you are ready to retire, the manager will show you to your lodgings. Pray rest and recuperate, and we shall reconvene in the Ocular anon.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: I believe that covers all of the practical concerns...

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: ...Thank you for answering my call, Forename. We are denied the comforting blanket of night, but may peaceful dreams attend you nonetheless.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: A pleasure to meet you, misssir, and welcome to your new home at the Pendants.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: Your room is ready, if you'd care to retire?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: Retire to your quarters?

dialogue.name: CRYSTALGATEKEEPER
dialogue.text: MistressMaster Forename. The Exarch awaits you within.

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Enter the Ocular?
